trans-unit.source: Identifies a data operation method exposed by a type, what type of operation the method performs, and whether the method is the default data method.
This class cannot be inherited.

You can use the DataObjectMethodAttribute to identify data operation methods on a type marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute so that they are more easily identified by callers using reflection.

When the DataObjectMethodAttribute attribute is applied to a method, it describes the type of operation the method performs and indicates whether the method is the default data operation method of a type.

Components such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class examine the values of this attribute, if present, to help determine which data method to call at run time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute"></xref> class and identifies the type of data operation the method performs.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A> property is set to `false` when you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> object using this DataObjectMethodAttribute constructor.
One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType"></xref> values that describes the data operation the method performs.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute"></xref> class, identifies the type of data operation the method performs, and identifies whether the method is the default data method that the data object exposes.
One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType"></xref> values that describes the data operation the method performs.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the method that the attribute is applied to is the default method of the data object for the specified `methodType`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
This method determines whether this <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
An object to compare with this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute"></xref>.
if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the obj parameter; otherwise, .
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

Gets a value indicating whether the method that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute"></xref> is applied to is the default data method exposed by the data object for a specific method type.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control uses the IsDefault property to distinguish between multiple methods that match the signature requirements for a specific method type.
If two methods match the signature requirements, the method with the IsDefault property set to `true` is selected.

At design-time the IsDefault property is used to automatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> instance.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> is created using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType%29> constructor that only takes a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType> parameter, the IsDefault property is set to `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is the default method exposed by the object for a method type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this instance shares a common pattern with a specified attribute.
This method determines whether one <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> fits the pattern of another.
Its implementation is not the same as that of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.Equals%2A>, however, because it does not test for true equality.
An object to compare with this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute"></xref>.
if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the obj parameter; otherwise, .
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType"></xref> value indicating the type of data operation the method performs.

One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType"></xref> values that identifies the type of data operation performed by the method to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute"></xref> is applied.
